detectors.description:
ZooToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZooToken.sol#1060-1078) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZooToken.sol#1070)
detectors.markdown:
[ZooToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZooToken.sol#L1060-L1078) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZooToken.sol#L1070)

detectors.description:

ZooToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZooToken.sol#926-967) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(now <= expiry,Zoo::delegateBySig: signature expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZooToken.sol#965)
